name: Mega Man 3: Double Noise
description:
Dr Wily is back!

Mega Man and Proto Man will fight together to save the world. Discover again level and boss from Mega Man 3 with new design.

____________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

  • [O] Select
  • [P] Pause

Player 1

  •  [WASD] to move
  • [G] to shot
  • [H] to jump
  • [T] Previous weapon
  • [Y] Next weapon

Player 2

  • [Arrows] to move
  • [Numpad 4] to shot
  • [Numpad 5] to jump
  • [Numpad 7] Previous weapon
  • [Numpad 8] Next weapon

Gamepad compatible for both
